We’re killing bugs and adding features!  Piklist v0.9.9.1 is available at WordPress.org Trunk.

Inspired by this support ticket by @cezarion, Piklist can now use a combination of client-side and server-side validation.  In the past, Piklist would stop any Piklist field from saving if it failed validation. Implementing this new feature will now stop the entire form from saving, including fields not created by Piklist.

To turn this on, head over to Piklist Settings and check the box marked “Javascript Validation”.

As always, please let us know if you have any issues with v0.9.9.1. “
